alethinophidia.game

Class GameView

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurfaceView
      • alethinophidia.game.GameView

  • public class GameView
extends SurfaceView
    GameView is the main Manager of entire app. Game Loop thread, and other game elements are created and managed in this class. Additional nested class, SurfaceControl is used to access abstract methods of Callback from android.view.SurfaceHolder
    Author:
    £ukasz Piotrowski
